tool_description: Computes inventory valuation using weighted average cost method, providing smooth cost averaging across purchase periods.

inventory_items.description: Array of item identifiers to process

calculation_period_start.description: Start date for weighted average calculation period

calculation_period_end.description: End date for weighted average calculation period

recalculation_frequency.description: Frequency for recalculating weighted average (daily, weekly, monthly)

error_messages: Missing inventory data: Ensure inventory_items array contains valid item identifiers.
Invalid calculation period: Start date must be before end date, both in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid recalculation frequency: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly].
Insufficient data points: Need at least 2 purchase transactions for meaningful weighted average calculation.
usage: Provide inventory_items and calculation period dates. Optionally set recalculation frequency. Returns weighted average cost calculations for inventory valuation.

total_inventory_value.description: Total inventory value using weighted average method

average_unit_costs.description: Weighted average unit cost for each item

cost_variance.description: Variance in costs over the calculation period
